Message.MsgText: WARNING_HOST_REMOVED_WORKCLASS=WXDO0106W: The removed {0} virtual host is referenced in work classes for the {1} on demand router on the {2} node. Update the following work classes: {3}
Message.Explanation: The removed virtual host is referenced in on demand router work classes.
Message.UserResponse: Update the offending work classes to reference an existing virtual host.
